Namespace Hasher


Extends millermedeiros.EventDispatcher.

Methods borrowed from class millermedeiros.EventDispatcher:
addEventListener, disableEvent, dispatchEvent, enableEvent, hasEventListener, removeAllEventListeners, removeEventListener, willDispatch
History Manager for rich-media applications.
Defined in: Hasher-0.9.7.js.

Namespace Detail
Hasher

Hasher

Field Detail
<static>
{string} Hasher.appendHash

String that should always be added to the end of Hash value.

  • default value: '/';
  • will be automatically removed from `Hasher.getHash()`
  • avoid conflicts with elements that contain ID equal to hash value;
<static>
{string} Hasher.prependHash

String that should always be added to the beginning of Hash value.

  • default value: '/';
  • will be automatically removed from `Hasher.getHash()`
  • avoid conflicts with elements that contain ID equal to hash value;
<static>
{string} Hasher.separator

String used to split hash paths; used by Hasher.getHashAsArray() to split paths.

  • default value: '/';
<static>
{string} Hasher.VERSION

Hasher Version Number

Method Detail
<static>
Hasher.back()

Navigate to previous page in history

<static>
Hasher.dispose()

Removes all event listeners, stops Hasher and destroy Hasher object. - IMPORTANT: Hasher won't work after calling this method, Hasher Object will be deleted.

<static>
Hasher.forward()

Navigate to next page in history

<static>
{string} Hasher.getBaseURL()

Retrieve URL without query string and hash.

Returns:
{string} Base URL.
<static>
{string} Hasher.getHash()

Return hash value as String.

Returns:
{string} Hash value without '#'.
<static>
{Array.} Hasher.getHashAsArray()

Return hash value as Array.

Returns:
{Array.} Hash splitted into an Array.
<static>
{string} Hasher.getHashQuery()

Get Query portion of the Hash as a String - alias to: millermedeiros.queryUtils.getQueryString( Hasher.getHash() ).substr(1);

Returns:
{string} Hash Query without '?'
<static>
{Object} Hasher.getHashQueryAsObject()

Get Query portion of the Hash as an Object - alias to: millermedeiros.queryUtils.toQueryObject( Hasher.getHashQueryString() );

Returns:
{Object} Hash Query
<static>
{string} Hasher.getHashQueryParam(paramName)

Get parameter value from the query portion of the Hash - alias to: millermedeiros.queryUtils.getParamValue(paramName, Hasher.getHash() );

Parameters:
{string} paramName
Parameter Name.
Returns:
{string} Parameter value.
<static>
{string} Hasher.getTitle()

Get page title

Returns:
{string} Page Title
<static>
{string} Hasher.getURL()

Retrieve full URL.

Returns:
{string} Full URL.
<static>
Hasher.go(delta)

Loads a page from the session history, identified by its relative location to the current page. - for example -1 loads previous page, 1 loads next page.

Parameters:
{int} delta
Relative location to the current page.
<static>
Hasher.init()

Start listening/dispatching changes in the hash/history.

<static>
Hasher.setHash(value)

Set Hash value.

Parameters:
{string} value
Hash value without '#'.
<static>
Hasher.setTitle(value)

Set page title

Parameters:
{string} value
Page Title
<static>
Hasher.stop()

Stop listening/dispatching changes in the hash/history.

<static>
{string} Hasher.toString()

Returns string representation of the Hasher object.

Returns:
{string} A string representation of the object.
